scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,ADMIN,CLIENT -c auto "pnpm -F backend dev" "pnpm -F admin dev" "pnpm -F client dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -F backend build && pnpm -F admin build && pnpm -F client build
scripts.preview: concurrently -n PREVIEW-ADMIN,PREVIEW-CLIENT -c auto "pnpm -F admin preview" "pnpm -F client preview"
